Key: Grrrr...
...Damn it, I can't finish.
(I was in my classroom after school holding my head.)

(I've been staring at my desk for the past 30 minutes
groaning, but I can't see the end of it. I'm sure if
someone were to see me, I'd look really suspicious.)

Well, if I didn't have to do this, I'd want to hurry
up and go home, but...
(Of course no one responded to my mutterings.)
And besides, Events that occurred today"? It's the

(This time, I decided to take things out on the desk,
knowing nothing was going to change.)
...It's really sad that I'm just doing stuff like this.
*sigh*...
(My sigh was engulfed by the empty classroom walls.)
Man, even study hall would be better at this rate.

There's nothing for me to write in the day duty
journal...

(Even though I spoke aloud, no one was listening.
Tama-chan... I mean, Okamine-sensei, seems to be in
the middle of a teacher's conference.)

Man. Tohka and the others went home already. I'm
bored.

(Being left behind with no one to talk to is tough. I
can't get my mind off of things or get any hints.)

(So it'd be better to go to study hall where all I
have to do is listen to a lecture.)
Uh, is this it?
Hm?
(I heard a familiar voice.)
(No, it can't be. She wouldn't be here.)
Oh, there you are. Shido, what are you doing? Ugh.
Huh? S-Seriously, Kotori, is that you?
Hehehe. I'm here.

What are you doing, Kotori? You promised you'd be
waiting at the school gate.

Gosh, how rude. It's because you took forever. I got
tired of waiting, so I came to see you.

I asked Tohka and the others on their way home and
they told me you were in the classroom.

But technically, outsiders can't be here without
permission. I hope you explained yourself to someone.
Now, now. Don't sweat the small things.
Hey...

(Look at her. Sticking her tongue out, acting all cute
to try and hide things...)

How much time are you spending on that journal?
Just hurry up and write something to finish it
already.

Yeah but... If I could do that, I wouldn't be taking
so long here.

Gosh, you're spending so much time on this... Can't
believe that I wasted any time worrying about you.
Oh, you were worried about me?
Huh?! O-Of course not...!
Well... I take it back.

(Kotori blushed and pouted, looking away. She's so
weak against things like this.)

(But thanks to her, I was able to switch on my
willpower.)
Hang on. I'll finish it now.
Kaaay.
(Kotori looked around the classroom intently.)
Ah. So this is your classroom, huh...
Is this Tohka's seat?
Yeah...
And that's Origami Tobiichi's?
Yeah.

Ah, so you have pretty girls on both sides. Flowers in
both hands.
...You think so?

(I gave a suspicious look and Kotori giggled. Kotori
should know that I'm always being sucked into their
ego fights.)
I seeee. Ohhhh. Uh-huhhh.

(She looked at the podium, the window, the locker in
the back, and eventually sat in Tohka's seat.)
Shido～
What?
I'm boreeed.
It hasn't even been five minutes!
Well, I'm bored. I can't help it. Give me attention.
As much as I want to, I have to finish this journal.

(I want to hurry up and finish so we can go home.
Now that my brain is working again, I wished she
wouldn't get in my way.)

If you're not going to give me attention, I'm going to
play tricks on you.
T-Tricks?

(She spoke in a sweet voice all of a sudden, and my
heart skipped a beat. Kotori smirked and went around
me.)
Hehehe. YAH...
Guess who?

Whoa. It's dark all of a sudden. Who could it be～
...Kotori, it's obviously going to be you!
Awww. You caught me.
Catch you? That isn't the issue.
Gosh, you're so boring, Shido.

I totally went along with your joke, though. Anyways,
stop distracting me!
Okay, okay, fine.

(Kotori pouted and fell silent. But it only lasted for
a moment. She leaned towards me.)
Shido, push your chair out a bit.
Huh? Why?
Just do it.

(I just did as she asked, leaving a space between my
body and my desk.)
(Kotori dove in without hesitation.)
Yah.
What the heck are you doing?!
(Why was she on my lap, facing me?!)
(She had her arms around me as she sat...!)
Get off, Kotori!
But Shido, you won't look at me at all.
That makes no sense!
Please, Shido. Look at me?
(Kotori said it in the sweetest voice.)
Tee-hee ☆

(She cocked her small head and made sound effects.
She poked my cheeks with her fingers.)
Whoa...

Hey, why are you so turned off... It's me. Of course
no matter what I do, I'll be cute. Be honest.

(My cheeks just twitched. I realized at a time like
this, even if she flirts with me, I learned.... that
it is a little annoying.)

(It's one of those situations. The more attention I
give her, the more it escalates. It'll never end.)
(Argh, just ignore her.)
Shido?
Hey Shido?
Shido.
Grr...

Hey, Shido. I said, Shido. Shido. HEY, HEY, HEY,
SHIDO, SHIDO, SHIDO, HEY, SHIDO!
SHUT UPPPP!
What do you want to do? Destroy Gestalt?!
Wow, you know that word? You sure are a nerd.
I won't deny it! But just shut up!

I mean, I came all the way here, and just waiting is
boring!

But if that's the reason why we're going home late,
what's the point of...
Even so!
ARGH!

(...I don't think I can just ignore Kotori. What do I
do...?)
Continue working
Poke fun at her

Okay, fine. Then I'm going to continue writing in the
journal. So just stay calm.
Fine. I guess I'll have to manage.
Why are you acting all high and mighty?
Anyways, let me finish this up. Don't get in my way.
Okay, okay.
(I totally can't trust her...)

(At this rate, I'll never finish. I have no choice. I
guess I'll just have to write something random.)
Uh... Seems like there are more detailed subjects
―Shido, you spelled it wrong.
(Kotori suddenly pointed it out.)
Detailed. It's spelled t-a-i-l". I bet you anything

Operator: you can't even spell girlfriend. Ugh, I can't believe

Key: Shut up! It was just a mistake!

(Gosh, she's just saying whatever she wants! I fixed
the spelling error and Kotori gave a victorious
snort.)
Damn it... Uh... So It's getting a little colder, so I

Operator: want to try not to get sick, but―""

Key: Hey Shido. Don't use so" twice in one sentence.

Operator: Do you even know how to live? Do you want me to
rearrange your bones so that you can feel alive?"

Key: Don't say such scary things!

(How does she go from talking about grammar to
something so harmful?! Kotori's the same as usual.)
Gosh. Uh...
Hey, Shido. Your handwriting's so messy.
That's just being rude!

(I understand her correcting my spelling and grammar,
but messy handwriting is not a mistake!)

Now, now. Hurry up and fill it in. Seriously, you
can't do anything without me.

(Damn it... She's acting like she's all that. At this
rate, as her brother and her boyfriend, my pride will
be hurt. I need to teach her a lesson...)

Kotori. You said you're going to stay like this until
I'm done, right?
Huh? Yeah I said that.
All right, then.
(I smirked and opened my legs wide.)
H-Hey, Shido?!
Don't move. You want to stay like this, right?
N-No! I can't close my legs!

(If I do that, that means Kotori's legs would widen
with mine. Since she's stuck on me, she won't be
able to close them. I have more power in my legs.)
I-It'll show! My underwear will show!

(Kotori rushed to hold down her skirt. It's true. If I
spread my legs this wide, she will have to be
careful.)

(But I won't see it, and there's no one around, so I
feel like she shouldn't care too much.)
Then I'll do this next.
(I grabbed Kotori's legs and then shook the chair.)
Hey...!
HAHHHHHH!
Kotori screamed and grabbed onto me.

You idiot, idiot, idiot! What are you thinking?! What
are you going to do if I fall?!
It'll be fine. I think.
I THINK?! That's not good!
All right, then let's do a little more.
NOOOOOOOO!
Stop it, Shido! Please, stop!

(I saw faint tears in Kotori's eyes. Maybe I went too
far...)

...Sorry. I went too far. But will you promise me
you'll be quiet?
...Okay.
Very well.
(Kotori's cute when she's this honest.)
Kotori, I'll play with you, so will you do me a favor?
Hm? Sure. What is it?
...Let me see your underwear.
Wh... WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT?!

(Kotori looked shocked. She wasn't expecting that
from me at all.)

If you don't want to, then get off. Those are your
choices. Let's make the conditions fair.

(I'm going to use random reasoning to crush all her
attempts of escape. How does she like that?! I'm sure
she has no choice but to get away.)

(I feel like I've lost the bare minimum of dignity
that I had as both a person and a brother, but I'm
just not going to think about that for now.)

(She's faltering. I don't blame her. Don't force
yourself, and just get off.)
...You wanna see it that bad?
...Huh?

(I wasn't expecting that answer and I was confused.
Kotori looked at me with puppy dog eyes.)
I'm asking you if you want to see my underwear that badly...
Huh? Huh? Um, Kotori?

My skirt is a little short today, so... I think if its from
behind, you can see my underwear.
(WHAT THE?!)

(It's true that Kotori's skirt was short. And to top
it off, she was sitting on my lap with her legs
spread.)

(Her back was defenseless. Depending on the angle,
you might be able to see it clearly...)
If it's you, Shido... I can show you.
GUO...!
(Kotori whispered in my ears with warm breath.)

You wanna see it? Are you okay with turning into a
pervert, looking at your girlfriend's underwear
in an empty classroom?
W-Well...

You don't have to say a thing. I'm embarrassed... but
if it's for you, I don't mind.
W-Wait, wait, wait!

(Just as Kotori reached for the corner of her skirt, I
couldn't take it anymore and stopped her.)

C-Calm down Kotori! Even if we're dating, there are
some things that are inappropriate―
I win.
...Huh?

Kotori had her prim expression back as she stared at
me.

You're so dumb. You tried to say something weird so
you'd distract me, huh? I won't fall for that.
Or... Were you really hoping to see something?
Idiot! O-Of course not!
Oh, I wonder.

(*grunt* She sees right through me... Kotori was one
step above me.)
Hurry up and write it. I wanna hurry home.
G-Got it.

(I guess I was dancing in the palm of Kotori's
hand...)
It's late.
It's because you were messing around, Shido.

Hey, you were the one that got in the way and came
to my school. That was a part of it, right?
Tee-hee.

(By the time we left the school gates, it had been
about 20 minutes after we submitted the journal.)

(In the end Kotori was caught by Tama-chan, a.k.a.
Okamine-sensei. She said she respected her for
coming to pick me up, but she still lectured us.)
But it was fun. I was able to see your classroom.
You satisfied?

Yeah... But considering that I can't be your
classmate, I felt a little lonely.

(I put my hand on Kotori's head. She looked at me,
confused.)
(But then she smiled.)

You don't have to be my classmate. You're my adorable
girlfriend.

(Kotori look dumbfounded with her mouth half-open.
But the next moment, she turned a fiery red.)

S-S-S-Say that all you want, but I won't fall for it! I'm
totally going to remember that you made me wait!
It's all your fault for taking your time!
Okay, okay.
Hey, are you listening to me, Shido?!
Yeah, yeah. Let's make Hamburg steak for dinner.
Y-You're totally trying to change the subject!
I'll make some salad and eggs with it.
I never asked for that!

(As she made a fuss, we went home. Kotori and I were
in our element like this.)
